pageContext.claim: “And the people are wise to it. And that's why my polls went up, I think they said, 17 points in the last two or three days. I've never had that one. I've never had that one.”
pageContext.analysis: It’s not clear to which polls Trump is referring. The polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight have found through an aggregate of polls that between 52-54 percent of Americans disapprove of President Trump. That’s remained steady since February.
